com.wm.app.b2b.server.auth

Class BasicToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wm.app.b2b.server.auth.BasicToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Token
    Deprecated. 
    As of Integration Server 8.0, replaced by JAAS-based authentication.

    public class BasicToken
extends java.lang.Object
implements Token
    This class represents an authentication token containing user name and password information. This type of token is created when a client submits a request to the webMethods Integration Server via the HTTP or FTP protocol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicToken(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Deprecated. 
      Allocates a new BasicToken with the speccified user name and password.

      java.lang.String getType()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns this token's type, which is "basic".

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a string representation of this token.

        Note: Use this method with caution! The string representation produced by this method will contain the submitted user name and password and therefore creates a possible security exposure.

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of this object.
